metadata.title: CVE-2015-3742 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebKit, as used in Apple iOS before 8.4.1 and Safari before 6.2.8, 7.xbefore 7.1.8, and 8.x before 8.0.8, allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) via a crafted web site, a different vulnerability thanother WebKit CVEs listed in APPLE-SA-2015-08-13-1 andAPPLE-SA-2015-08-13-3.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
